name: Eagle Valley Golf Course
description: Carson City favorite with East and West layouts—popular for golf groups, leagues, and tournaments.

faqs.question: What’s included in Eagle Valley golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Eagle Valley (East/West), carts, and concierge planning. Add transportation, dining, and multi-course options.

faqs.question: How much do Eagle Valley group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $199–$499 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you organize corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and transportation for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Eagle Valley Golf | Carson City Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Book Eagle Valley in Carson City with golf groups, tee times, and stay & play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and tournaments.
